title: I’ll Die If I Fall in Love, It’s Too Hard! - Novel Updates
tags: Bisexual Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Otome Game   Time Loop   Transported into a Game World
author: Mikami Teren   みかみてれん
description: A peacefull story of the self alleged 'Normal girl',Crazy Psycho Bitch, Fujii Hina, asked by a certain company's employee that came from the future, Schulz, to test the new VR shoujo game that their company created. *Though, if she fell in love, she'll die.>
